notice: NOTICE TO FILE MISSING PARTS OF APPLICATION--FILING DATE GRANTED

missing_parts.description: The statutory basic filing fee is missing or insufficient.

missing_parts.surcharge: NO SURCHARGE IS REQUIRED FOR THIS ITEM.

missing_parts.description: The oath or declaration is missing.
missing_parts.surcharge: A SURCHARGE MUST ALSO BE SUBMITTED AS INDICATED BELOW.

missing_parts.description: The oath or declaration does not identify the application.
The signature to the oath or declaration is missing.
The signature of the following joint inventor(s) is missing.
missing_parts.surcharge: A SURCHARGE MUST ALSO BE SUBMITTED AS INDICATED BELOW.

missing_parts.description: The application was filed in a language other than English.
missing_parts.surcharge: NO SURCHARGE UNDER 37 CFR 1.16(e) IS REQUIRED FOR THIS ITEM.

missing_parts.description: A $20.00 processing fee is required for returned checks.
Your filing receipt was mailed in error because check was returned.

other: A Serial Number and Filing Date have been assigned to this application. However, to avoid abandonment under 37 CFR 1.53(d), the missing parts and fees identified above in items 1 and 3-6 must be timely provided ALONG WITH THE PAYMENT OF A SURCHARGE OF $110.00 for large entities or $55.00 for small entities who have filed a verified statement claiming such status.
deadline: ONE MONTH FROM THE DATE OF THIS LETTER, OR TWO MONTHS FROM THE FILING DATE, WHICHEVER IS LATER
extensions: Extensions of time may be obtained by filing a petition accompanied by the extension fee under the provisions of 37 CFR 1.136(a).
